title: Nice Troll Riot!!! your MMR Team/System must be laughing so hard right now!!!
body: I think i am eligible for a refund of points here ..............................

replies.body:
There is absolutely nothing wrong with that matchmaking.

Also, get off your high horse, who are you to decide if somebody bought their account or not. I get the same kind of nonsense because I have a plat border but I'm gold this season, if I have a bad game my team will flame me accusing me of buying my account. What a joke, especially when plat 5 is actually WORSE then gold but of course all the idiots who have never been to plat before seem to think it is some awesome rank that is hard to get.
playing malphite you kinda deserve to lose

Unranked are started at about Silver V/IV MMR, add on the fact that it takes **10 games** to get them a rank during which time they could climb to Gold+ MMR and the fact they could be doing placements **for this season** having ended last season at Gold+ MMR and there's nothing wrong with the matchmaking system. Lodge any complaints to yourself, as that's the only person who cares.

So? Unranked doesn't mean they just hit 30, It means that they have not done ranked this season. They could have been diamond last season from what this shows us. Besides, Your team MMR is higher, suggesting that the average MMR of your team is higher than theirs. Ranks mean a lot less than MMR as far as looking at skill level goes
i have checked them all only 1 is gold last season all other 3 are new this season........ and the gold had no idea how to play clearly he bought the account
